xml.episodeInfo:
FUTURAMA
Episode 404
LOVE AND ROCKET
Dan Vebber Dave, The Neutral Planet
xml.info: Opening Credits. Caption: When You See The Robot, Drink!
Ship's Cockpit. Bender argues with the ship at a port that looks like the ports HAL 9000 used in 2001: A Space Oddysey. The ship speaks with a male voice.
xml.speak: You are one narrow minded spaceship Planet Express Ship.
Whoa whoa! Why should my tax money pay for art I find offensive?
xml.info: Bender flips through a book titled Art & You and holds up a page with a picture of a Horrible Gelatinous Blob.
xml.speak: Would you censor the Venus de Venus just because you can see her spewers?
Oh its filthy! Why not create a national endowment for strip clubs while we're at it?
Why not indeed!
Bender! Ship! Stop bickering or I'm going to come back there and change your opinions manually!
Fine! I'll be in my quarters appreciating controversial artworks.
xml.info: He leaves. The door closes on him and cuts his head off. It lands on the floor and rolls a little.
xml.speak: (SARCASTICALLY) Oops! Sorry!
xml.info: He chuckles.
Planet Express: Meeting Room. The crew are sat around the table. Bender screws his head back on.
xml.speak: Ah that ship is so white bread!
xml.info: Enter Hermes and Farnsworth carrying several red boxes.
xml.speak: People! It's Valentines Day next week, so your beloved company has gotten you all new uniforms!
xml.info: Everyone opens their boxes and reacts well to the uniforms.
xml.speak: Cool!
Clothing, delicious clothing!
We'll need to look our best if we're to get the account of our new potential customer Romanticorp!
Romanticorp? Are they a corporation that makes romantic stuff?
Very good Amy!
Everyone suit up. We're off to the most romantic city on Earth!
xml.info: Milwaukee. The ship flies in and lands in the Romanticorp factory. The doors have lips painted on them and make kissy sounds when they close.
Cut to: Romanticorp Factory Entrance.
xml.speak: Remember, we've got to show these people we're not bitter husks of human beings who long ago abandoned hope of finding love in this lifetime. Leela you'll have to do some acting.
Check!
xml.info: Some doors open and a man and a woman, Sheldon and Gwen, walk in.
xml.speak: Welcome, aww I'm just so excited! I'm Sheldon and this is my chief financial officer Gwen.
For 30 years we've shared the adventure of managing Romanticorp.
Not to mention the adventure of marriage!
xml.info: They both laugh. Then they kiss again.
xml.speak: Oh you have got to be kidding! Ow! Ow! I mean, aww thats so sweet! Ow! I mean, (soppily) Aww dats show shweet!
xml.info: Farnsworth nods.
Romanticorp Factory Production Line. The crew and Sheldon and Gwen are moving along a moving walkway.
xml.speak: You know, romance is an important part of our work too, uh right everyone?
xml.info: The crew nod in agreement.
xml.speak: Do any of you collect Lovey Bears?
I do! Kif's given me dozens! Is it true what the ad says? That you kiss them together out of blanket cloth and magic buttons?
No.

It's actually cheaper to genetically engineer real ones. They frolic in the Lovey Forest until their first birthday then we choose the cuddliest ugliest ones and stuff them full of fire retardant love fluff!
xml.info: In the Lovey Forest, bears are picked up and put onto a conveyor belt where they are delivered to the Bear "Hospital".
xml.speak: (UNSURE) Oh cute!
xml.info: Romanticorp Factory Romance Acceleration Lab.
xml.speak: Knowing which pickup lines fizzle and which ones sizzle keeps us on the cutting edge of flirtation technology.
xml.info: Two robot frames stand in front of a woman.
xml.speak: Is heaven missing an angel? 'Cause you've got nice cans!
xml.info: The woman is not impressed.
xml.speak: My two favourite things are commitment and changing myself.
xml.info: The woman is lovestruck and hugs the frame.
xml.speak: Does that dummy have a brother?
xml.info: Romanticorp Factory Candy Hearts Production.
xml.speak: And now friends and lovers we come to the heart of our operation. Pun definately intended!
xml.info: He and Gwen laugh. Leela sighs. Farnsworth threatens her with the cattle prod. Hermes picks up a candy heart that says "Cutie Pie."
xml.speak: Impressive!
My family has been making these hearts since the 1900's. Tastes may have changed but our secret recipe sure hasn't.
xml.info: She points to a machine mixing Bone Meal and Earwig Honey. Fry picks up a candy heart.
xml.speak: Whoa! Letters like "U" and "R" can mean words like "You" and "Are." Here Leela, U-R-2 Cute!
Perhaps. What's your point?
I've never been able to put into words how I feel about you. But somewhere among these trillions of hearts, those words must already exist. And I'm gonna find them.
xml.info: He dives into a barrel and rummages around. A Lovey Bear runs around being chased by a hunter. The hunter shoots and misses. Farnsworth zaps the Lovey Bear with the cattle prod and it falls over. He turns to Sheldon and Gwen.
xml.speak: So, do we have the contract?
xml.info: Ship's Cockpit. The ship is now back in the hangar and the crew have changed back into their normal clothes.
xml.speak: With that big new Romanticorp contract, I've been able to make those government mandated upgrades you've all been suing me about.
xml.info: The crew look around the cockpit.
xml.speak: Ooo look! You taped up the cracks in the dark matter reactor!
And you got a cage for the lion!
xml.info: The cage is in the ceiling. The lion growls and swipes it's paw at Fry. Bender turns the radio on.
xml.speak: Hey who's been messing with the radio? This isn't alternative rock. It's college rock!
Oh it must have been the ship's new improved personality software I installed.
Yeah it was me. It's a cute song.
Listen ship! No one changes my stations! I hope you have a good mechanic!
xml.info: He rolls his sleeves up.
xml.speak: It even comes with an adjustable voice.
xml.info: He adjusts the voice. As the ship speaks its voice changes from the smartarse male voice to a friendly female voice.
xml.speak: We each get one of the four buttons remember Bender? That was the deal.
xml.info: She giggles.
xml.speak: Wha? Did you just say...?
If you don't like the stations you could just...play with my buttons 'til you find something we both enjoy. Oh gosh! That came out all wrong!
Too late baby, you said it! So what'll it be? My place? Or you?
xml.info: Time Lapse. The crew are now in uniform and are cruising through space. Fry enters with a barrel of candy hearts.
xml.speak: Before we deliver these hearts, I'm gonna find the one that sums up my feelings for you! "I Love You." Hmm, too conventional. "You're My Man." Ooo so close!
I'm not impressed by a guy's message Fry. I'm impressed by the guy. Or not.
xml.info: The ship shakes violently. Fry falls over.
xml.speak: Whoa!
What was that?
Maybe we hit a space cow.
xml.info: Cut to: Ship's Engine Room. Bender is tickling a control panel.
xml.speak: Coochie coochie!
(GIGGLING) Stop it! You're mussing up my trajectory!
You know you love it sugar-engine!
xml.info: He presses some buttons.
xml.speak: (GIGGLING) No!
xml.info: She laughs. Enter Fry and Leela.
xml.speak: Bender! What's going on in here? Planet Express Ship! Cover your shame!
xml.info: Ship closes the control panel.
xml.speak: It's not what it looks like. Bender was just helping me...zip up my turbine.

Wow Bender. Are you and the ship an item? I mean I know you're both items but...how can you date a ship anyway? It'd be like me dating a really fat lady. And living inside her. And she'd be all like...
xml.info: He impersonates a ship.
xml.speak: Fry, in order for me to get busy at maximum efficiency, I need a girl with a big 400 ton booty!
xml.info: He taps the wall.
xml.speak: Bender, dating your co-worker and primary mode of transportation is immoral, illogical and a violation of interstellar shipping statute 437-B.
That's what makes it so nasty!
xml.info: He strokes the control panel. Ship giggles. He giggles and rubs himself up the wall.
xml.speak: Still, given the chance, I've given to urges far more shocking.
xml.info: Bender starts rubbing a girder.
Musical Scene. Bender sings A Bicycle Made For Two while he dates the ship. First he sits on one of the tail fins with a picnic set up. The sheet blows in the breeze of space.
xml.speak: (SINGING) Daisy, Daisy, give me your answer do. I'm half crazy all for the love of you. It won't be a stylish marriage......I can't afford a carriage. But you'll look sweet upon the seat of a bicycle built for two.
xml.info:
On the hangar roof Bender and Ship dance under the moonlight.
[Planet Express: Meeting Room. Leela reads a newspaper while Fry is still searching for the perfect candy heart.
xml.speak: Well, I'm sick of her.
The ship? But you just started dating.
With my mighty robot powers I can get sick of things much quicker than you humans.
Well just remember we all still have to work together. So try and let her down easy.
In due time Leela. But for now I'll just resume dating cheap floozies on the side.
You have much to teach us.
Ugh. Doesn't it bother you even a little to be taking advantage of your girlfriend's trust?
xml.info: Bender laughs.
xml.speak: Oh wait you're serious. Let me laugh even harder.
xml.info: He laughs even harder.
Elzar's Fine Cuisine. Bender sits with two Fembots. They giggle.
xml.speak: What's it like being a lawyer for the Mayor's office? And also the world's strongest millionaire?
Well baby, for starters you gotta be honest all the time!
xml.info: Enter Elzar.
xml.speak: Good evening Bender! And to your lady friends may I say - Bam!
xml.info: The Fembots giggle.
xml.speak: You know Elzar?
xml.info: Through a window Ship watches Bender and the Fembots.
Cut to: Outside Elzar's Fine Cuisine. Ship sighs.
Robot Arms Apartments: Fry and Bender's Apartment. In Fry's room the windowbell ding dongs and awakens Fry. He opens the window. It is Ship.
xml.speak: Planet Express Ship? Is that you?
Oh. Hi Fry. Is Bender home?
Uh, um no. I think he's at his parent's.
Oh I see. He didn't fly there in another spaceship did he?
Bender? No! He's an old fashioned one spaceship robot. Look I'll tell him you stopped by OK?
OK.
xml.info: Fry closes the window and walks back to his bed. Almost immediately the windowbell goes off again. He walks over and opens the window. Ship is still there.
xml.speak: Oh. Hi Fry. Is he home now?
xml.info: Central Park Zoo. Bender and the ship stroll around.
xml.speak: Of all the zoos we've been to today, I like this one the best. Bender, which is your favourite nocturnal rat?
Eh, they're all pretty unimpressive.
xml.info: The ship swoops off in another direction.
xml.speak: Oh honey look! The Tapirs! It says here that the babies lose their pyjama like coat after their first year. Isn't that interesting honey?
Yup. Mind numbingly interesting. Ooh!
xml.info: He spies a Fembot and zooms in on her.
xml.speak: Bender!! Are you looking at other women?
No baby never!
xml.info: He turns around. His eyes are fully zoomed.
xml.speak: (CRYING) Bender! Don't lie! I saw you at Elzar's with those two ladys of the evening. Explain that!
OK, I like a challenge. Aah! I got it! I'm going to be completely honest with you Planet Express ship. Those women you saw me with...were my accountants!
Your accountants? Oh I would dearly love to believe that were true. So I do.
Phew!
I'm going to go home and get dinner started.
xml.info: She zooms off. Bender's chest cabinet opens. Lucy Liu's head in a jar is still there.
xml.speak: Who are you talking to?
No one baby! Lucy Liu is the only girl for Bender!
I love you -
xml.info: He slams the door on her.
Ship's Cockpit. Leela is steering the ship through an asteroid belt and is back in her new uniform. Ship sighs.
xml.speak: Planet Express Ship is something wrong?
Oh it's Bender. He's acting so strange lately. Do you think he's going to ask me to marry him?
Uh, no.
Oh-oh, someone knows something she's not telling!
xml.info: Leela sighs.
xml.speak: Uh look, I'm not saying Bender's not great but have you ever considered that maybe he's...y'know...not that great?
xml.info: Ship scoffs.
xml.speak: You're just jealous! No one loves you because you're tiny and made of meat!
xml.info: An asteroid suddenly hits Ship's windscreen.
xml.speak: Could you maybe pay a little more attention to these asteroids?
Sorry Captain Leela. I guess I'm just having one of those...manic Mondays!
xml.info: She laughs insanely. Leela laughs unsurely and then grins unsurely.

Ship flies towards Omicron Persei 8 (246/7 Days Without Invading Earth) and lands outside a huge castle, home of the planets' rulers, Lrrr and Nd-Nd.
[Cut to: Omicronian Castle. Lrrr and Nd-Nd watch TV.
xml.speak: This is ancient Earth's most foolish program. Why does Ross, the largest Friend, not simply eat the other five?
Perhaps they are saving that for sweeps.
xml.info: Enter a guard.
xml.speak: Exaulted leaders, the Earth messengers have arrived bearing a peace offering from their weak and fearful government.
Oh very well. This is a Joey heavy episode anyway.
xml.info: He turns the TV off. Enter Leela, Fry and Bender with the barrels of candy hearts.
xml.speak: I am Lrrr of the planet Omicron Persei 8.
xml.info: A picture slips from the wall. He puts it back. Leela reads from a piece of paper.
xml.speak: (READING) Esteemed potentates of Omicron Persei 8, please accept these 20 billion candy hearts as proof that Earth loves you. Thiiis much!
xml.info: She holds her arms out wide. Lrrr and Nd-Nd taste the candy hearts. They immediately spit them out.
xml.speak: Bleurgh! These candies are choccy and unpleasant!
And what is this emotion you humans call "wuv"?
Surely it says "love"?
No, "wuv." With an Earth "w." Behold!
(SHOUTING) This concept of wuv confuses and infuriates us!
xml.info: Guards surround the crew, guns at the ready.
Cut to: Ship's Cockpit. The ship and crew have taken off and are pursued by Omicronian saucers.
xml.speak: Incoming torpedoes. Shields at maximum yarnell.
Steady, Planet Express Ship. Focus on diverting all power to the scramjets.
Uh look, Planet Express Ship, this might not be the best time...but...well...I really like you and whatever but...I think we should just be friends.
(SCREAMING) Nooo!
xml.info: Cut to: Outside Ship. She jerks to a stop.
Cut to: Ship's Cockpit.
xml.speak: So we're cool?
xml.info: The Omicronian torpedoes hit the ship and explode.
Time Lapse: The ship is tumbling through space with black scars on the hull. Ship is crying. Leela prints a readout from a machine and looks at it.
xml.speak: Well, it was a spectacular battle but there doesn't seem to be any permanent damage.
(CRYING) No damage? What about my feelings?
Aww, calm down. I'm sure Bender is taking this just as hard as you are.
xml.info: Cut to: Fry and Bender's Quarters. They are both lying in their hammocks.
xml.speak: (SINGING) Bender is great oh Bender is great. Bender Bender Bender!
You couldn't have picked a better time to dump the ship Bender!
Eh, the moment seemed right. Call me old fashioned but I like a dump to be as memorable as it is devastating.
xml.info: Ship's Cockpit. It is nighttime ship's time. Ship is still crying. Leela is wearing her pyjamas and is sat in her chair facing Ship's port. She starts eating another tub of ice cream.
xml.speak: I know, I know. Look Ship, if there's one thing I learnt from my mutual breakup with Sean that was totally mutual its that happiness can only come from within you.
(CRYING) But Bender is within me! There must be some way to make him love me again.
Trust me. You can't change men anymore than you can change the laws of time and space.
That's so true. I may not be able to change the laws of time and space, but I know something that can.
xml.info: Leela turns around and looks through the windscreen. She gasps. The ship is heading straight towards a huge quasar. She wrestles with the controls but they won't move.
xml.speak: (UNSURE) Uh sweetie? You see that giant quasar we're heading into? You might wanna scooch a few parsecs to the left.
xml.info: Ship, the movie buff, resonds calmly.
xml.speak: I'm afraid I can't do that Leela.
xml.info: Enter Fry and Bender.
xml.speak: What's happening? Space cow?
The ship's just taking the breakup a little hard. (whispering to Fry) She's nuts!
In a few moments the power of 10 million black holes will smush me and Bender together into a beautiful enternal quantum singularity.
xml.info: The crew scream.
xml.speak: Uh you don't need to kill us Planet Express ship...because...I love you! Uh yeah baby! I feel like doing stuff.
Hmm. I don't believe you. If you really wanted to be with me you'd merge your program with mine.
Whoa whoa whoa! Slow down! All of my friends that have done that said that afterwards all the passion went out of their relationship.
Look, I don't know if you want my opinion -
Leela. Bender and I really need to be alone. So, I'm turning off the oxygen.
xml.info: The oxygen goes off and Leela and Fry start to suffocate. They grab some oxygen tanks and put them on.
xml.speak: Now look missy! If you don't trun around now I'm going to have to shut down your brain!
Fire detected in the vicinity of Leela.
xml.info: A fire hose comes down from the ceiling and hits Leela with a jet of water.
xml.speak: Ha! That barely hurt Leela at all!
Maybe not. But what if the artificial gravity were to malfunction?
xml.info: The gravity goes off and Fry, Leela and Bender float towards the ceiling. The candy hearts float upwards and out of the barrels. Bender screams.
xml.speak: Float for your lives!
xml.info: They all swim through the door.
Ship's Bathroom. The crew get into the shower and Leela closes the door.
Cut to: Shower.
xml.speak: This is the one place she can't hear us. Everyone just pretend to shower.
Same as everyday, got it.
Now here's the plan.
xml.info: Cut to: Ship's Bathroom. Ship has another port in the bathroom. She tries to listen to the plan but can't hear through the soundproof shower glass. All she sees is Leela's lips moving.
xml.speak: Oh, if only I could read lips!
xml.info: Cut to: Shower.
xml.speak: Comprendez Bender? You'll have to distract her. Merge your program with hers while I shut down her brain.
It's too risky. I'm a very meek individual. If her personality engulfs mine, the Bender you know and worship could disappear forever!
xml.info: Leela doesn't take long to think about the situation.
xml.speak: I'm willing to take that risk.
xml.info: Ship's Cockpit. The ship gets closer to the quasar. Bender floats in. There are candy hearts everywhere.
xml.speak: Hey pookums! Contrary to what I was saying earlier, melding minds with you would be extremely bearable.
xml.info: Ship gasps.
xml.speak: You really mean it?
Uh......yes!
xml.info: He pulls out a wire from inside the control panel and connects himself via a modem.
Ship's Mind. The Tron-esque environment looks sort of like a motherboard. Bender looks around in a panic. Ship is a little smaller and she has eyes and is wearing lipstick.
xml.speak: Huh? Tubes? You're older than you said you were!
Come closer Bender. Lets become one!
I prefer two. That way we can still be a horse for Hallowe'en.
xml.info: Ship moves closer to Bender. He backs away.
Ship's Brain Room. Fry and Leela float in. There are candy hearts floating around. Leela waves her hand across one of Ship's ports. No reaction.
xml.speak: OK, Bender has her distracted. Now I can shut down her brain by deactivating the carbonated logic matrix. Ugh. I can't concentrate with this obnoxious candy in my face.
I'm on it. And maybe I'll find those magic words while I'm at it.
Fat chance.
Eh. Blech! Eurgh! Ooo how 'bout this one?
Give it up Fry! I've got to pop these tops in a precise order.
xml.info: She pops another one. Fry sadly eats another heart.
Time Lapse.
xml.speak: Halfway there. The ship should be getting a little less rational now.
xml.info: Cut to: Ship's Mind. Ship is chasing Bender making irrational noises.
xml.speak: Want...to...engulf...Bender!
xml.info: She cackles and grows fangs.
Cut to: Ship's Brain Room.
xml.speak: Only a few more. Hey! I won free admission to Six Flags! Just one more reason we must survive this.
xml.info: Fry is about to eat another heart but notices Leela's oxygen gauge. The needle points at critical.
xml.speak: Um, Leela?
Fry! I'll read your candy later! When we're not dead! What was that?
(SUFFOCATING) Oh nothing.
xml.info: Cut to: Ship's Mind. Ship is still chasing Bender. He comes to a dead end on the motherboard.
xml.speak: We're gonna love being each other you sexy ion!
(SCREAMING) Nooo!
xml.info: She moves towards him.
Cut to: Ship's Brain Room.
xml.speak: Last one! It worked! Gravity normal, air returning, terror replaced by cautious optimism! We did it Fry! Fry? You gave me your oxygen? Oh no! Breathe Fry breathe! You leave me breathless! Happy Valentine's Day Fry!
(GASPING) Happy Valentine's day.
xml.info: Ship's Cockpit. Bender has separated from the ship. He wakes up. Enter Fry and Leela.
xml.speak: Bender! Are you OK?
Aw. What crazy thing am I going to date next?
Well at least it sounds like you were able to keep your conciousness seperate from hers.
Of course! Bender is a lone wolf. A solitary eagle. A cuddly baby Tapir! And that's why I love 'em!
xml.info: He walks out.
xml.speak: Well I guess we'd better clean up these millions of hearts.
Nah, I've got a lazier idea.
xml.info: The ship's cargo bay doors open and the candy hearts float out and into the quasar.
As he speaks shots of couples on Earth come and go. Horrible Gelatinous Blobs, mutants, Amy and Kif and Fry and Leela (joined by Zoidberg).
THE END
